S.FORM: Brunei hya' ga cyux maki' tay 4 30 N, 114 40 E na Aziya' syuw. Brunei hya' ga cyux maki' tay 4 30 N, 114 40 E na Aziya' syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 5,765 sq km (maki' tay 173ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 5,265 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 500 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 436,620. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 2.5% , lhlahuy hya' ga 71.80%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 25.70%. 汶萊(Brunei) spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Bandar Seri Begawan. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 23 na tay sazing byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Haji Hassanal Bolkiah Mu'izzaddin Waddaulah, aring ryax 5 squ byacing tay 10 sa kawas 1967 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. zyuwaw kin raral歷史 aring squ 8 Seci lga nyux ki'an na squliq la ,maki Cyukok na唐朝bnrwan naha zyuwaw kin raral ga婆利sun naha, bnrwan nqu 明朝 zyuwaw kin raral hya ga Brunei sun naha, maki uzi qu bnrwan naha maha勃泥或渤泥. maki squ ziray na梁,maki qutux hi' lalu nya ga Pinka naha ki ngasan nya kaundinya ,naha ga smnhi squ Paypya. skahun squ bnrwan naha hya qu smsun lmahang squ 136nqu rhyan , kbalay squ king ka ttman mrhuw, taqu qqplan nya ga kinnalay nya squ Ing kinbalay nya smyax na btunux qu qbbu nq Mrhuw, pongan kay ga taqu kilwagiq nqu qbbu nya ga 1kung ci kilwagi nya. maki518 kawas pnosa nya qutux Psatu musa squ Cyukok,ru biqan nya qutux ssamaw squ rhyan qu Mhuw.maki squ523 kawas ,pnosa nya qutux qu Psatu musa binah na Kokka. maki squ ziray na 隋,Mrhuw na Brunei Hu Lu Na Po ru ngasannya他的家人, 即Chiari Ya Ka maki sa 616 kawas, pinnosa naha uzi qu Psatu musa Cyukok. maki squ ziray na 唐朝, k'nita na kwara squliq ga cinmuywaw balay qu Mrhuw na Brunei ma,maki squ kawas na貞觀(669),minpposa cingay na Psatu musa te Cyukok. zik nqu Kawas na 宋朝 binnrwan naha qutux squ lalu na mrhuw Hiang Ta, min maki kbhul qu qasu nya, ru maki uzi qu hitay nya . maki squ zki na kawas 宋太宗, mrhuw Hiang Ta ga s'tun nya qu Psatu musa Cyukok, lalu na linhoyan Psatu qasa ga阿布阿里,Sheikh Noh ki Kadhi Kasim. maki squ kawas mkura tltu宋元豐1082 kawas 2 byacing, minstun nya uzi qu Psatu musa Cyukok. Pinnongan kmal maha,lalu nqu Psatu qani ga Seri Maharaja,'mmyunaw hya ga Raha Makatuna ki Sang Aji,taqu Sang Aji ga m'yutas nqu 蘇丹馬合謨沙 la. maki sa1395 kawas biru bnrwan na明太祖朱元璋 kmal maha maki squ15 Kokka ini ptciriq ga ,勃泥qani uzi ma. bsyq balay sqbangan na gaga Cyukok qu Brunei qani ,babaw nqu 13 Seci m'gaga na伊斯蘭.ziray nqu Brunei ga kahul渤泥國蘇丹馬合謨沙ki tmmnwang na福建黃森屏qu gmleng maras squ rngu sinqunan na squliq na Cyukok. 明代永樂kawas na浡泥mruwh 麻那惹加那minmma gmleng maras tthoki musa Cyukok mita squ明成祖.wal rasun na 'nbula,'blun squ 南京,buqun nqu mrhuw na 浡泥misuw qani . maki squ binnrwan zyuwaw kinraral ga gluw na Brunei mrhuw hya ga 黃森屏 qani qu puqing na mrhuw naha , mucing soni naga maki na qu "buqun nqu kwara hhitay黃總兵墓". 14 Seci, Brunei伊斯蘭教君主國thriq squ qinhtan na爪哇 ,maki squ zik te14 tehok squ 15 Seci mintxan krahu balay qu rngu naha, kwara ana 菲律賓mkura kilux ru 砂拉越ki沙巴 ga rhyan nqu Kokka naha；tqbangun na squliq歐洲 ru kwra qpzing naha lga wal mn-gyut mskongat la. rhyan nyux maki squ wiway s'luwi ru mkilux qutux kawas nqu 婆羅洲熱帶雨林 ,kwara rhyan qani ga psgayun ni 砂拉越 maha ht'gan wagi,ru tekyopan wagi sazing qu qinsugan nya. mmusa su squsazing qinsugan hrhyan qani ga siki pwah su squ rhyan na 砂拉越林夢, mucing squ 2020 kawas baqun mwah na glgan qu hongu na 淡武隆lga,pbuyaun naha qu sazing rahyan qani la. pklahang ptzyuwaw squ squli gaga nqu pklahang ptzyuwaw squ squli Brunei nqu 蘇丹,'mubuy aring squ14 Seci qani ga smmyunaw squ mrhuw naha ,squ m'Sexu nqu Kokka ru mrhuw na thokiy hhitay. 蘇丹qani ga skahul nya squ lalu na mrhuw Kokka m'thoki na Brunei .kwara nqu ps'rux gaga' linhoyan Gi'ing na Brunei ga蘇丹qani qu musa mtywaw,ungat qu ginoywaw nqu ssquliq na ps'rux gaga' linhoyan Sexu hya . mwaha smsun zyuwaw na Kokka naha hya ga yaqu 馬來伊斯蘭君主制,kwra qu zik na pinkyalan ga maki kya uzi qu kay na 馬來, Bungka ru gaga qu spyang naha sinnhyan nqu 伊斯蘭qu glgan naha, rmuruw squ ps'rux gaga' linhoyan 伊斯蘭ki nirang kinnita naha,qpzing nqu mrhuw te babaw, shtuy naha msgagay gaga na pinsrhgan naha . Brunei蘇丹 skahul squ pinsrux gaga Brunei. Brunei蘇丹hya ga mrhuw na Kokka naha,mrhuw nqu sinnhyan ,mtnaq maki sinnpung nqu yuwaw, ps'rux gaga', maki qu qpzing krahu. Misuw qani 蘇丹 hya ga te 29 Seci 哈吉·哈山納爾·博爾基亞,1946kawas hintagan nya squ Brunei syuw.bes mrhuw qasa ga wiwal nqu sswae knril薩拉赫.1967 kawas sazing hi qani lga msqun la, spayat qu laqi nya kneril sazing qu laqi nya mlikuy qu薩拉赫qani, pyang krahu laqi mikuy ga 比拉赫 mosa galan squ mrhuw babaw.1981kawas magan lozi bes米麗亞姆·阿布都·阿濟茲,melaqi sazing laqi mlikuy ru sazing laqi kneril .2003 kawas sazing byacing , mtalax ki米麗亞姆 kbnahun nya magal kwara qu lamu na lalu . 2005kawas 8 byacing 20 ryax maki squ spzyang qalang na 馬來西亞吉隆坡ki亞茲麗娜·瑪茲msqun .qutux qu laqi mlikuy ru qutux qu laqi kneril naha. mali 2010 kawas 6 byacing,msgagay qu rusa qani. ubuy mrhuw ngasan蘇丹 ubuy mrhuw ngasan Brunei ga kilrrngu rmuruw gaga maha mway mslpiyung nqu ubuy mrhuw gluw ta nanak ,teta kinrrhuw qu qpzing cintman na squliq馬來ru mlahang squ qpzing cintman nqu ubuy mrhuw cinngasa maha kya qu gaga nya, wiwal nqu pleliq lmahang qutux ramu na ubuy mrhuw ngasan. misuw蘇丹博爾基亞kneril nya 莎麗哈qaniy ga(Saleha binti Mohamed Alam)wiwal sswe nya nanak, yaya nya達米特(Damit binti Abdul Rahman)ki yaba na莎麗哈穆罕默德·阿南(Pengiran Pemancha Pengiran Anak Haji Mohammad Alam)mtswae naha nanak:yutas naha賽義夫汀三世(Omar Ali Saifuddien III)hya ga laqi nqu蘇丹哈欣·再如·阿南·阿馬汀(Hashim Jalilul Alam Aqamaddin)wiwal nqu laqi naha nanak.nanau yasa qu達米特ki莎麗哈m't yata qu m't ina naank . kinlhangan na kki'an行政區域 Kokka nqu Brunei ga spayat qu qinsugan nya kinlhangan na kki'an (daerah): maki squ Kokka na Brunei ga摩拉Kil qu pyang cikiy , mrhuw Kokka nqu qalang斯里巴卡旺市(Bandar Seri Begawan; 舊稱汶萊城sun naha maha smral na qalang Brunei)maki squ zik na Kil , kilhgcyan nya ga 571pinbang kugri , kinhmayan na squli nya ga 230,030 . • 馬來奕Kil ga spyang krahu naqalang,kinghyan nya ga 2,724 pinbang kuri,kinhmayan na squliq nya ga 55,602. • 淡布隆Kil ki rhyan 印度尼西亞,ga qwyan na Brunei灣mkkita squ talay nanak 飛地Kil,kinghyan nya ga 1,304 pinbang kugri,kinhmayan na squli nya ga 8,563. • 都東Kil,kinghyan nya ga 1,166 pinbang kugri,kinhmayan na squli nya ga 38,649. gwahan na pila puqing na abura ki m'ma na Gasuring qani qu spyang psr'an naha , kwara qu pinhtagan naha mtyuwaw kbalay ggwahan na qeqaya Kokka ga kya wal squ 90% maki squ ht'gan wagi ki mkura kilux ,snli naha squ abura ru kil cingay nya ga hnasun nya qu 印度尼西亞,te sazing .Kokka naqu Brunei qani ga spyang cinmuyuwaw na qutux Kokka, hya qani ki 新加坡 ga ta sazing na kin cinmuywaw maki squ Kokka nqu ht'gan wagi ki mkura kilux ,ana ga misuw knita naha squ Kokka na Brunei qani ga nyux minaring kbalay na. 2005 kawas squliq nqu Brunei kinblayan naha qu kwara qeqaya ga mosa siki 15,964 pila nqu Amirika,squliq na Kokka naha kya ga ini biq Giking . 2010 kawas squliq na Kokka Brunei kinblayan naha qu kwara qeqaya ga mosa siki 51,600 pila nqu Amirika. Kinbalay squ Koba Brunei(Brunei Investment Company)qani ga maki te歐美9 'byan ru nniqan cyux maki sa美國,英國,法國ru義大利,ana yaqu比貝弗利山 'byan ru nniqan, 倫敦多爾切斯特(The Dorchester)'byan ru nniqan,ru 巴黎雅典娜 ki 'an 'byan ru nniqan. sinnhyan宗教 sinnhyan nqu Kokka Brunei ga伊斯蘭Kyokay,蘇丹qaniy hya ga mrhuw pgleng nqu 伊斯蘭Kyokay.smmnhi squ伊斯蘭Kyokay hya ga kinhmayan na squli nya ga wayal squ70%,kinhmayan na squli smnhi squ paysimin hya ga wayal squ 12%,kinhmayan na squli smmnhi squ Kirisstokyo hya ga 9%. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Bronei hya' ga cyox maki' tay 4 30 N, 114 40 E na Aziya' syow. Bronei hya' ga cyox maki' tay 4 30 N, 114 40 E na Aziya' syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 5,765 sq km (maki' tay 173ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 5,265 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 500 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 436,620. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 2.5% , lhlahoy hya' ga 71.80%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 25.70%. 汶萊(Bronei) spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Bandar Seri Begawan. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 23 na tay sazing byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Haji Hassanal Bolkiah Mo'izzaddin Waddaolah, aring ryax 5 sqo byacing tay 10 sa kawas 1967 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. zyowaw kin raral歷史 aring sqo 8 Seci lga nyox ki'an na sqoliq la ,maki Cyokok na唐朝bnrwan naha zyowaw kin raral ga婆利son naha, bnrwan nqo 明朝 zyowaw kin raral hya ga Bronei son naha, maki ozi qo bnrwan naha maha勃泥或渤泥. maki sqo ziray na梁,maki qotox hi' lalo nya ga Pinka naha ki ngasan nya kaondinya ,naha ga smnhi sqo Paypya. skahon sqo bnrwan naha hya qo smson lmahang sqo 136nqo rhyan , kbalay sqo king ka ttman mrhow, taqo qqplan nya ga kinnalay nya sqo Ing kinbalay nya smyax na btonox qo qbbo nq Mrhow, pongan kay ga taqo kilwagiq nqo qbbo nya ga 1kong ci kilwagi nya. maki518 kawas pnosa nya qotox Psato mosa sqo Cyokok,ro biqan nya qotox ssamaw sqo rhyan qo Mhow.maki sqo523 kawas ,pnosa nya qotox qo Psato mosa binah na Kokka. maki sqo ziray na 隋,Mrhow na Bronei Ho Lo Na Po ro ngasannya他的家人, 即Chiari Ya Ka maki sa 616 kawas, pinnosa naha ozi qo Psato mosa Cyokok. maki sqo ziray na 唐朝, k'nita na kwara sqoliq ga cinmoywaw balay qo Mrhow na Bronei ma,maki sqo kawas na貞觀(669),minpposa cingay na Psato mosa te Cyokok. zik nqo Kawas na 宋朝 binnrwan naha qotox sqo lalo na mrhow Hiang Ta, min maki kbhol qo qaso nya, ro maki ozi qo hitay nya . maki sqo zki na kawas 宋太宗, mrhow Hiang Ta ga s'ton nya qo Psato mosa Cyokok, lalo na linhoyan Psato qasa ga阿布阿里,Sheikh Noh ki Kadhi Kasim. maki sqo kawas mkora tlto宋元豐1082 kawas 2 byacing, minston nya ozi qo Psato mosa Cyokok. Pinnongan kmal maha,lalo nqo Psato qani ga Seri Maharaja,'mmyonaw hya ga Raha Makatona ki Sang Aji,taqo Sang Aji ga m'yotas nqo 蘇丹馬合謨沙 la. maki sa1395 kawas biro bnrwan na明太祖朱元璋 kmal maha maki sqo15 Kokka ini ptciriq ga ,勃泥qani ozi ma. bsyq balay sqbangan na gaga Cyokok qo Bronei qani ,babaw nqo 13 Seci m'gaga na伊斯蘭.ziray nqo Bronei ga kahol渤泥國蘇丹馬合謨沙ki tmmnwang na福建黃森屏qo gmleng maras sqo rngo sinqonan na sqoliq na Cyokok. 明代永樂kawas na浡泥mrowh 麻那惹加那minmma gmleng maras tthoki mosa Cyokok mita sqo明成祖.wal rason na 'nbola,'blon sqo 南京,boqon nqo mrhow na 浡泥misow qani . maki sqo binnrwan zyowaw kinraral ga glow na Bronei mrhow hya ga 黃森屏 qani qo poqing na mrhow naha , mocing soni naga maki na qo "boqon nqo kwara hhitay黃總兵墓". 14 Seci, Bronei伊斯蘭教君主國thriq sqo qinhtan na爪哇 ,maki sqo zik te14 tehok sqo 15 Seci mintxan kraho balay qo rngo naha, kwara ana 菲律賓mkora kilox ro 砂拉越ki沙巴 ga rhyan nqo Kokka naha；tqbangon na sqoliq歐洲 ro kwra qpzing naha lga wal mn-gyot mskongat la. rhyan nyox maki sqo wiway s'lowi ro mkilox qotox kawas nqo 婆羅洲熱帶雨林 ,kwara rhyan qani ga psgayon ni 砂拉越 maha ht'gan wagi,ro tekyopan wagi sazing qo qinsogan nya. mmosa so sqosazing qinsogan hrhyan qani ga siki pwah so sqo rhyan na 砂拉越林夢, mocing sqo 2020 kawas baqon mwah na glgan qo hongo na 淡武隆lga,pboyaon naha qo sazing rahyan qani la. pklahang ptzyowaw sqo sqoli gaga nqo pklahang ptzyowaw sqo sqoli Bronei nqo 蘇丹,'moboy aring sqo14 Seci qani ga smmyonaw sqo mrhow naha ,sqo m'Sexo nqo Kokka ro mrhow na thokiy hhitay. 蘇丹qani ga skahol nya sqo lalo na mrhow Kokka m'thoki na Bronei .kwara nqo ps'rox gaga' linhoyan Gi'ing na Bronei ga蘇丹qani qo mosa mtywaw,ongat qo ginoywaw nqo ssqoliq na ps'rox gaga' linhoyan Sexo hya . mwaha smson zyowaw na Kokka naha hya ga yaqo 馬來伊斯蘭君主制,kwra qo zik na pinkyalan ga maki kya ozi qo kay na 馬來, Bongka ro gaga qo spyang naha sinnhyan nqo 伊斯蘭qo glgan naha, rmorow sqo ps'rox gaga' linhoyan 伊斯蘭ki nirang kinnita naha,qpzing nqo mrhow te babaw, shtoy naha msgagay gaga na pinsrhgan naha . Bronei蘇丹 skahol sqo pinsrox gaga Bronei. Bronei蘇丹hya ga mrhow na Kokka naha,mrhow nqo sinnhyan ,mtnaq maki sinnpong nqo yowaw, ps'rox gaga', maki qo qpzing kraho. Misow qani 蘇丹 hya ga te 29 Seci 哈吉·哈山納爾·博爾基亞,1946kawas hintagan nya sqo Bronei syow.bes mrhow qasa ga wiwal nqo sswae knril薩拉赫.1967 kawas sazing hi qani lga msqon la, spayat qo laqi nya kneril sazing qo laqi nya mlikoy qo薩拉赫qani, pyang kraho laqi mikoy ga 比拉赫 mosa galan sqo mrhow babaw.1981kawas magan lozi bes米麗亞姆·阿布都·阿濟茲,melaqi sazing laqi mlikoy ro sazing laqi kneril .2003 kawas sazing byacing , mtalax ki米麗亞姆 kbnahon nya magal kwara qo lamo na lalo . 2005kawas 8 byacing 20 ryax maki sqo spzyang qalang na 馬來西亞吉隆坡ki亞茲麗娜·瑪茲msqon .qotox qo laqi mlikoy ro qotox qo laqi kneril naha. mali 2010 kawas 6 byacing,msgagay qo rosa qani. oboy mrhow ngasan蘇丹 oboy mrhow ngasan Bronei ga kilrrngo rmorow gaga maha mway mslpiyong nqo oboy mrhow glow ta nanak ,teta kinrrhow qo qpzing cintman na sqoliq馬來ro mlahang sqo qpzing cintman nqo oboy mrhow cinngasa maha kya qo gaga nya, wiwal nqo pleliq lmahang qotox ramo na oboy mrhow ngasan. misow蘇丹博爾基亞kneril nya 莎麗哈qaniy ga(Saleha binti Mohamed Alam)wiwal sswe nya nanak, yaya nya達米特(Damit binti Abdol Rahman)ki yaba na莎麗哈穆罕默德·阿南(Pengiran Pemancha Pengiran Anak Haji Mohammad Alam)mtswae naha nanak:yotas naha賽義夫汀三世(Omar Ali Saifoddien III)hya ga laqi nqo蘇丹哈欣·再如·阿南·阿馬汀(Hashim Jalilol Alam Aqamaddin)wiwal nqo laqi naha nanak.nanao yasa qo達米特ki莎麗哈m't yata qo m't ina naank . kinlhangan na kki'an行政區域 Kokka nqo Bronei ga spayat qo qinsogan nya kinlhangan na kki'an (daerah): maki sqo Kokka na Bronei ga摩拉Kil qo pyang cikiy , mrhow Kokka nqo qalang斯里巴卡旺市(Bandar Seri Begawan; 舊稱汶萊城son naha maha smral na qalang Bronei)maki sqo zik na Kil , kilhgcyan nya ga 571pinbang kogri , kinhmayan na sqoli nya ga 230,030 . • 馬來奕Kil ga spyang kraho naqalang,kinghyan nya ga 2,724 pinbang kori,kinhmayan na sqoliq nya ga 55,602. • 淡布隆Kil ki rhyan 印度尼西亞,ga qwyan na Bronei灣mkkita sqo talay nanak 飛地Kil,kinghyan nya ga 1,304 pinbang kogri,kinhmayan na sqoli nya ga 8,563. • 都東Kil,kinghyan nya ga 1,166 pinbang kogri,kinhmayan na sqoli nya ga 38,649. gwahan na pila poqing na abora ki m'ma na Gasoring qani qo spyang psr'an naha , kwara qo pinhtagan naha mtyowaw kbalay ggwahan na qeqaya Kokka ga kya wal sqo 90% maki sqo ht'gan wagi ki mkora kilox ,snli naha sqo abora ro kil cingay nya ga hnason nya qo 印度尼西亞,te sazing .Kokka naqo Bronei qani ga spyang cinmoyowaw na qotox Kokka, hya qani ki 新加坡 ga ta sazing na kin cinmoywaw maki sqo Kokka nqo ht'gan wagi ki mkora kilox ,ana ga misow knita naha sqo Kokka na Bronei qani ga nyox minaring kbalay na. 2005 kawas sqoliq nqo Bronei kinblayan naha qo kwara qeqaya ga mosa siki 15,964 pila nqo Amirika,sqoliq na Kokka naha kya ga ini biq Giking . 2010 kawas sqoliq na Kokka Bronei kinblayan naha qo kwara qeqaya ga mosa siki 51,600 pila nqo Amirika. Kinbalay sqo Koba Bronei(Bronei Investment Company)qani ga maki te歐美9 'byan ro nniqan cyox maki sa美國,英國,法國ro義大利,ana yaqo比貝弗利山 'byan ro nniqan, 倫敦多爾切斯特(The Dorchester)'byan ro nniqan,ro 巴黎雅典娜 ki 'an 'byan ro nniqan. sinnhyan宗教 sinnhyan nqo Kokka Bronei ga伊斯蘭Kyokay,蘇丹qaniy hya ga mrhow pgleng nqo 伊斯蘭Kyokay.smmnhi sqo伊斯蘭Kyokay hya ga kinhmayan na sqoli nya ga wayal sqo70%,kinhmayan na sqoli smnhi sqo paysimin hya ga wayal sqo 12%,kinhmayan na sqoli smmnhi sqo Kirisstokyo hya ga 9%. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
